author: jochembrouwer
content: Did I miss something for the devnet-5 spec? I thought that 7742 would get an update but they are both striped out?

author: jochembrouwer
content:
And this one got added? https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9060
Was this added in latest consensus layer call?

author: ralexstokes
content: yes, we decided to hold off on any type of blob gas normalization for now

author: ralexstokes
content: #9060 would ensure the fee market is consistent for the proposed change to target and max in EIP-7691
